abstract: Revising its euro zone growth forecast for 2014 upward to 1.1 percent, the central bank kept its main interest rate unchanged.
snippet: Revising its euro zone growth forecast for 2014 upward to 1.1 percent, the central bank kept its main interest rate unchanged.
lead_paragraph: FRANKFURT — On Thursday, when much of the world economy looked a bit brighter, even the European Central Bank offered a more optimistic view of the cloudy euro zone.

headline.main: European Central Bank Sees Reasons for Optimism
headline.print_headline: European Central Bank Sees Reasons for Optimism
